definition: Dai Temple, a temple in Shandong for the god of Mount Tai
Mt Tai in Shandong/same as 泰山

sentences.english: We saw the sunrise and the sea of clouds on Mount Tai and visited Dai Temple in the daytime.
sentences.chinese: 我们在泰山看了日出和云海，白天还去参观了岱庙。

definition: Jade Emperor Peak on Mt Tai in Shandong
